ygData.subject: Re: Mage armour
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Agility is *the* life saver. The problem isn t if it doesn t hit, you don t take damage , it s if it doesn t hit, your casting isn t *interrupted*!
ygData.messageBody:
According to Wizard:
> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
> Best defence is a strong offence but when this fail what remain ?
>
> - agility it is life saver if he dont hit you he cant dammage you!

Agility is *the* life saver. The problem isn't "if it doesn't hit, you
don't take damage", it's "if it doesn't hit, your casting isn't
*interrupted*!" (which means life when fading out)

> cloth armour is base armour found a many low lw MOBs like orc pawns, cents
> some skeletons

By level 5, I had a full set of cloth on myself. I'm now saving up to upgrade
my shirt to a Sr Apprentice Robe (same AC, additional mana) for level 7.
(restarted recently. My soul didn't feel comfortable in a Dark Elf body)

> g......... armour can be won in najena

Gossamer. Say the word.

> s.... s..... is beter jet as it also give some magic bonuses

Shiny Silk. Say the word.

> l..... armour is similar but takes much more time to get

Lupine. Say the word (and take a long time to pay Karg)

> Finaly B... D..... S.... Armour make you look and feel realy great with a
> resistence and a other magic adds make you

There you lost me :)

> - last line of defense can be some escape spells or sacrifical pets but
> escape spells are very very unstable so it is realy emergence and when you
> dont have any other hope that you can use them. Fade and shadow step is
> some of this spells but from my experience after using this spell you
> finish dead as it teleports you 10 cm. from monster and before you can run

It varies. In dungeons, it is great because it will teleport you on the other
side of the wall. Better know your way then :)
